title: Blended language learning design using digital education technology: Integrating text, expression, and reading comprehension with cultural context

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational language learning concepts: grammatical structure comprehension, basic vocabulary acquisition, foundational readingÂ·writing skills, and awareness of intercultural communication
context.additional_context: Operating a blended learning model combining VR/simulation-based activities and face-to-face classes in a BYOD environment. Emphasizes digital content creation and collaborative projects tailored to language domain characteristics: text analysis, situational expression training, and comprehensive language proficiency development through cultural context understanding. Focuses on cultivating learners' communication strategies and critical thinking skills.

learning_goals: In blended learning environments, produce and present three or more language projects using digital tools (blogs, webquests, etc.), emphasizing text structure analysis and advanced vocabulary application
Develop the ability to design integrated learning goal-assessment-activity plans based on backward design principles, considering linguistic expression diversity and grammatical system refinement
Pass VR simulation-based cultural immersion and situational dialogue assessments in target language contexts, meeting listening/speaking proficiency criteria and communicative strategy standards
Improve language projects twice or more based on peer feedback and formative assessment, applying iterative feedback and contextual expressions to enhance writing and reading skills
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
